about_the_game:
Sheriff Pinball

A small town is in need of a new sheriff and you are exactly the right person!
Patrol the town, maintain order in the saloon, guard the bank, fight the gangsters with up to 3 balls at the same time and arrest them.
In short: Protect the town.
The gangster boss won’t like that and, sooner or later, he will challenge you. So be on the alert!
For this table, you need a fast reactivity and a steady hand. It is going to be hard, but you can make it!
Do you accept the challenge?
